pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Fa3 yuan4
Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4

sentences.english: On earth there which tall person can show a mountain dew a water?
sentences.chinese: 地球上有哪位高人可以顯一次山露一下水呢？

sentences.english: It is said that he had lived in seclusion for many years.
sentences.chinese: 傳說中他是個世外高人，已經遁跡山林好多年了。

sentences.english: Such this old monk's pouring is truly an out of this globe Gao Ren.
sentences.chinese: 如此這位老僧倒真是一位世外高人了。

sentences.english: Who can wonder those latent lofty men would be so happy when smelling this kind of fragrance?
sentences.chinese: 誰想到山林裏隱逸的高人，聞到了芬芳便滿懷喜悅。

sentences.english: Supreme SEOER of you, Baidu seems not big update, right?
sentences.chinese: 諸位SEOER高人，百度貌似還沒大更新吧？

definition: an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent
great scholar respected for learning and integrity
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
the younger generation/those who come after
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
